Name: Amore
Review Text: I almost don‚Äôt want to tell anyone how great this place is because I want to keep the secret to myself but that would be a disservice to the EXCELLENT hospitality and experience you get from Amore e Amore!!! From start to finish, the staff ‚Ä¶

Name: Amore
Review Text: This place was all around a great experience! The food was amazing from start to finish and the service is next level. Not only is the staff friendly, attentive and have a great vibe but Professor Giovanni made everything much more special. I loved everything about my dinner. I will definitely be coming back

Name: Amore
Review Text: Restaurants are usually defined by how good the food is. While the food at Amore e Amore is outstanding, the feeling you get when arriving makes you feel like you are a part of a secret family that you would never want to leave. ‚Ä¶

Name: Amore
Review Text: This is a hidden gem of a restaurant. This family owned restaurant will go above and beyond to make you feel welcome and leave you feeling satisfied! The ambiance is so exciting as they decorate for each holiday. The service is top notch - ‚Ä¶

Name: Amore
Review Text: One of the best dinners I‚Äôve had ever! If you want Italian in Atlanta, this is your place. We are vegetarians and they happily accommodated to diet. They made my husband the most delicious vegetable primavera. Also, try the cart of goods ‚Ä¶

Name: Amore
Review Text: This is our go-to for celebration dinners. The food is exceptional! Don't miss the lobster bisque ... and share it, as you'll want room for everything else! Their lobster ravioli and vodka gnocchi are our favorites and should not be missed. ‚Ä¶

Name: Amore
Review Text:
If I could give Amore e Amore more stars I would!
Hands down perfection; the service, the atmosphere, the food, the drinks... simply amazing. I felt like close family/friends immediately. I have told everyone about Amore e Amore. I will definitely be back. Can't recommend enough.

Name: Amore
Review Text: The only thing better than the amazing food is Giovanniü§£ü§£ü§£ The Red Snapper, the asparagus, the spinach were simplyüî•üî•üî•üî•üî• The Canoli! The "limone" sorbet!

Name: Amore
Review Text: Great Italian restaurant. Super unique atmosphere and a lot of fun (disco music and party hats). You will not leave hungry, lots of amazing food. The owners are there to greet you and ensure you have a great experience.

Name: Amore
Review Text: So glad they are still there. Such a fun place and the food is amazing. The owners are one of a kind!

Name: Amore
Review Text: I always thought St. Cecilia was the best Italian place in town, but after going to Amore e Amore twice now, I firmly put Amore e Amore as the best Italian restaurant in Atlanta and perhaps the whole Southeast. We love the old school vibe, ‚Ä¶

Name: Amore
Review Text: Always amazing mama gale and prof gio are like family and the best lobster bisque in the city

Name: Amore
Review Text: We came here for a date night, and our 7-week-old tagged along. We were escorted to a quiet(er), private little area in the back. It was perfect! Baby slept, and we got to enjoy a lovely evening out. The food was excellent, but the service ‚Ä¶

Name: Amore
Review Text: We were lucky enough to find this incredible restaurant during our trip to Atlanta.  From the moment you walk in the door, you will realize that the restaurant is a special place.  The atmosphere is one that transports you to straight to a ‚Ä¶

Name: Amore
Review Text: One of the best Atlanta has to offer. Great food, festive atmosphere,. A family owned business with wonderful people  - being in New York - or even Italy. Don't miss this gem!

Name: Amore
Review Text: This is a hidden gem. Traditional Italian food in a cute, cozy environment. Service was great - the waiters were attentive and nice. The food was delicious. Great wine selection. Would recommend!

Name: Amore
Review Text: Loved it. We didn't have a reservation. Hostess let us in. Excellent food and service. Loved the little old man that came to our table and made us laugh.

Name: Amore
Review Text: An incredible experience from start to finish! Hands down the best Italian food in Atlanta. Start with the crusty bread with garlic butter, the fresh parmigiano, and the Arugula salad with burrata. The Eggplant Parmigiana is the best I've ‚Ä¶

Name: Amore
Review Text: I always have a great time here. The food is impeccable that's probably what people care about, but the best thing about Amore e Amore is the vibe. It's always pleasant and lively, and the staff make it such an enjoyable experience. ‚Ä¶

Name: Amore
Review Text: This is one of the loveliest restaurants in Atlanta. Food is really good too. I‚Äôm giving 5 stars altho customer service isn‚Äôt all that great. Everything else is so above average tho. Sea Bass is delicious as is the very traditional cheese cake.

Name: Amore
Review Text: They are unable to split checks for whatever reason. I forgot it‚Äôs 1970. They also did not tell us that auto gratuity was included so our party all tipped extra for an undeserving experience. The food was average and overpriced. Cut the ‚Ä¶

Name: Amore
Review Text: I loved the atmosphere, glass bottle water, & bread. But the wait staff was rude. Me and my friend decided to go else where after the appetizer. Couldn‚Äôt even tell who our server was and everyone ignored us. When we asked for the check. The server had an attitude and gave a smart remark. Would never ever go back.

Name: Amore
Review Text: This place feels like home!! The best service, the best authentic food, and the best atmosphere. By far my favorite Italian in Atlanta. You must go!!!

Name: Amore
Review Text: Food and atmosphere were fantastic. Makes you want to go hug your family.

Name: Amore
Review Text: One of the best dining experiences. The owner is so friendly and kind and makes sure each guest is accommodated. Highly recommend if you are looking for a date night with girlfriends or your significant other. Plus, the interior decor is so beautiful!

Name: Amore
Review Text: If you‚Äôre looking for GREAT Italian food - this is the place. I don‚Äôt know who the Miller‚Äôs are but they have their own pasta dish named after them and it is amazing. My daughter had the lobster ravioli and she said it was perfect. We will be back!!!

Name: Amore
Review Text: The minute my daughter and I walked in we were treated like family. The food, the atmosphere, the service, the staff... phenomenal. We had such a good time. This restaurant should be on everyone's "to do" list if in Atlanta. Love, love, love this place!!!

Name: Amore
Review Text: Awesome place. The owners are great. Staff were awesome. The history and the stories they have about the place. And the food, just wow.

Name: Amore
Review Text: This place is amazing! I went with my parents to celebrate my one year wedding anniversary with my husband and we had a great time. Giovanni made sure we were taken care of and didn‚Äôt leave hungry. The pasta was plentiful and the wine kept ‚Ä¶

Name: Amore
Review Text: There is not a better Italian restaurant in all of Atlanta. The food, the environment, & especially the love you receive from Professor Giovanni & Mama Gale is second to none. If you are looking for the best place for dinner in all of Georgia, go to Amore e Amore.

Name: Amore
Review Text: Service and food are both AMAZING!  Can't recommend enough!  Wife actually asked if we could come back the next 3 nights in a row to try more things :)

Name: Amore
Review Text: Fantastic food and excellent service. Our waiter was very attentive and thoughtful. Will go again.

Name: Amore
Review Text: Overpriced entries. Entrees very bland and not worth the price. Need better Chef.  Very tight spot, which can be quite uncomfortable. Not a child friendly environment. Owners and staff very pleasant though!! Only one check issued per group. Not too pleased we weren't advised before orders were taken.

Name: Amore
Review Text: Cutest restaurant I have been to in Atlanta. Great food and cocktails! The restaurant decor is so unique and quirky too. I highly recommend Amore e Amore.

Name: Amore
Review Text: Delightful cuisine, attentive, but not intrusive staff that made the experience so enjoyable - and the owner seems to truly love his customers. They hit all the marks. Stop reading and make that reservation.

Name: Amore
Review Text: Our favorite restaurant for special occasions üòÅ they treat you like family and the food is excellent and drinks are superb!

Name: Amore
Review Text: Great food and lovely staff, highly recommend.

Name: Amore
Review Text: Was looking on open table and stumbled across this place. Made a reservation for date night for my fianc√© and I. Can I just say this place feels like home?! We both enjoyed our meals, he had the lobster ravioli and I had the chicken parm. ‚Ä¶

Name: Amore
Review Text: Incredible food and the people who work there treat you like family. This is such a warm, inviting place to eat. Shrimp fra diavolo was outstanding. You need to go here, you will not regret it!

Name: Amore
Review Text: Food was unbelievable and everyone made you feel welcome, great service

Name: Amore
Review Text: Wow! Wow! Wow! This hidden gem came recommended from some very close friends of ours. It‚Äôs always a gamble trying a new place especially in such a big vibrant city. It was our anniversary and everything was spectacular the whole restaurant ‚Ä¶

Name: Amore
Review Text: This is our favorite Italian restaurant.  Really glad they opened back up.  Highly recommend for those looking for a quality meal and entertaining night.

Name: Amore
Review Text: Bizarre energy in this restaurant. One example: They have a smoke machine that they blasted right on to a table and the women were literally waving fog out of their faces and away from their plates. At the heart of it though, Prices were way too high for portions and quality.

Name: Amore
Review Text: Great restaurant!!!Bought so much things! One problem none of the employees spoke French to my kids. Very disappointed but my kids loved it, we drank some beer and had fun.

Name: Amore
Review Text: The absolute best Italian experience anyone could ask for! Loved it, great food and atmosphere can‚Äôt wait to come back!

Name: Amore
Review Text: Still a staple of Atlanta. The food and family style service made it feel like home. Get the canoli!!!

Name: Amore
Review Text:
Disappointing
Very overpriced for barely mediocre food and service. There are much better Italian restaurants nearby. Won‚Äôt be going back.

Name: Amore
Review Text: Still my favorite Italian restaurant!!!

Name: Amore
Review Text: The food was excellent and the services was 100% authentic Italian food

Name: Amore
Review Text: Pricey and crowded/cramped but the food and service are excellent.
